issue.title: [Python] chdir logic in setup.py buggy
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2070](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2070). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In some conditions, `setup.py` may change the current directory and omit restoring the previous one, which can fail some operations.
